text: Latifur Rahman (1 March 1936 â€“ 6 June 2017) was a Bangladeshi politician and lawyer. He served as the 10th Chief Justice of Bangladesh from January 2000 through February 2001. In 2001, he was appointed to briefly serve as Prime Minister, a position he would hold from 15 July 2001 until 10 October 2001. Rahman died in Dhaka, Bangladesh on 6 June 2017 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Bangladeshi lawyers Category:Prime ministers of Bangladesh Category:Politicians from Khulna Division
title: Latifur Rahman
